writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

getFilter().Description: Get the filters that will restrict the query results.

getPageToken().Description: A token that indicates the next page of results to retrieve. This should be a token that was returned in a previous query.

getSortOrder().Description: Returns @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#query#SortOrder_E@ containing information about sorting order of the query. Can be null when no sorting order is added to the query.

ClassDesc: The query object specifies constraints on a query result, including filters, paging information.
